summary: An ordinance providing for the refunding of $4,566,000.00 of Seattle General Bonds 1946 issued pursuant to Ordinance Nos. 74603 and 74942 by the issuances and sale of general negotiable interest bearing serial coupon bonds in said sum for capital purposes; providing for a loan and for the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest of said bonds; creating a bond interest and redemption fund, and pledging a specific portion of the permissible tax levy in connection therewith.
